article: I thought my luck had run out at the end of the summer holiday. It was not the  _  of the new term that did it, but the  _  military training. My  _  nightmare had finally come true. It was the first time in my life that I have ever really felt  _  . However, we had to stand completely  _  all day. The drill-master were very strict with us. It left such a deep impression on me that I can almost smell it right now.I guess most of the other students  _  the same experience that I had. I often thought of giving up and going back home.  _  , I didn't. One day, our PE teacher came to watch our  _  for a while. Then he  picked me out  to join the national flag squad . "You movement is the best of all," he praised me. It was so  _  ! I almost couldn't believe my ears. It was a great honor to be chosen for the squad. Now military training has finished and I have become a flag protector in my school. Every time I raise the flag, I know all my hard work has  paid off
